name: Touhou: Lost children at the bamboo forest
name_original: Touhou: Lost children at the bamboo forest
description:
Cirno and her friends were playing a game of hide and seek and got lost in the bamboo forest! Help her get her friends back and escape!

This game was made in colaboration with https://chainedtan.itch.io/ , he did the graphics and the music while I did the coding and sound effect. This game was made in 3 days for the Touhou fan game jam.

Get the OST here: https://soundcloud.com/chained-tan/sets/touhou-lost-children-at-the-bamboo-fores...
